description: This file defines the interface for the CCSP Message Bus within a telemetry component, including function declarations for managing message bus engagement, initialization, finalization, resource cleanup, and message handling via DBus.

methods.name: ssp_T2Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Initiates engagement of the message bus for a specified component, using provided configuration and path.

methods.name: ssp_T2Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the telemetry message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_T2Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Performs cleanup and finalization of the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_T2Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Checks the status or connectivity of the message bus using user data.

methods.name: ssp_T2Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus interface, considering priority and user data.

methods.name: T2_path_message_func
methods.description: Handles incoming DBus messages on a specified connection, using the provided user data.
